alert.note: Alert for Northern Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Livingston Parish through 430 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Livingston, or 9 miles east of Denham Springs, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denham Springs, Walker, Livingston and Watson. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 10 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
